entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Grand Beach

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
